known_issues: "Load failed" error occurs when trying to make a cover (after deployment/build issues).

existing_features.title: Improve error handling for the Replicate API calls used during cover creation so that generic browser/network errors (e.g., fetch throwing a TypeError that surfaces as “Load failed”) are caught and converted into a clear, user-facing error message that includes the failing step (create prediction, poll prediction, download result) and the HTTP status/body when available.

Add a preflight configuration check on the Create Cover flow to detect when `VITE_REPLICATE_API_TOKEN` is missing/empty at runtime and block submission with a clear on-page error explaining that AI cover creation requires a Replicate API token and how to configure it (referencing `VITE_REPLICATE_API_TOKEN`).

Ensure the audio MIME type used when converting uploaded audio bytes to a data URL is derived from the uploaded file (with safe fallbacks) rather than always using `audio/mpeg`, to reduce conversion failures for non-MP3 uploads.

Add lightweight diagnostic logging (console-level) around the cover creation pipeline to help identify where failures occur (model URL fetch, Replicate create, Replicate poll, result download, backend save), without exposing the Replicate API token in logs.

projectName: Fix “Load failed” error when creating an AI cover
